introductory.translation[0].definitions[: said or written at the beginning of a book, speech etc in order to explain what it is about
as the chairman said in his introductory remarks
the objectives described in the introductory chapter
intended for people who have never done a particular activity before
an introductory course in data processing
introductory.translation[1].definitions[: a special low price that is charged for a new product for a limited period of time
It will normally sell for £12 but as an introductory offer the booklet is available for just £10, until the end of the month.
